articles.title: Superheated steam dishwasher could kill bacteria in just 25 seconds
articles.description: Computer simulations of a simplified dishwasher that uses hot, dry steam and no detergent found that it could kill all heat-resistant bacteria on a plate in under half a minute – but it might not actually clean your dishes
articles.content:
By Karmela Padavic-Callaghan
Superhot steam could kill bacteria without soap
